name: universal-web-crawler
description: A universal web crawler with configurable selectors, structured output, and automated config generation for Yahoo Finance data across TW/US/JP markets

scripts.//: === 基礎構建與開發 (Build & Development) ===
=== 清理命令 (Cleanup Commands) ===
=== 清理進度檔案 (Progress Cleanup Commands) ===
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean:output && npm run clean:dist && npm run clean:progress
scripts.//: === 代碼質量檢查 (Code Quality) ===
=== 爬蟲核心命令 (Core Crawler Commands) ===
=== Pipeline 工作流程 (Pipeline Workflows) ===
=== Pipeline 區域執行 (Pipeline by Region) ===
scripts.pipeline:tw:daily: npx tsx src/cli-pipeline.ts run --regions tw --data-types history --skip-symbol-import --skip-label-sync --skip-fundamental-import
scripts.pipeline:us:daily: npx tsx src/cli-pipeline.ts run --regions us --data-types history --skip-symbol-import --skip-label-sync --skip-fundamental-import
scripts.pipeline:jp:daily: npx tsx src/cli-pipeline.ts run --regions jp --data-types history --skip-symbol-import --skip-label-sync --skip-fundamental-import
scripts.//: === Pipeline 重試機制 (Pipeline Retry) ===
=== 配置生成 (Config Generation) ===
scripts.generate:configs: npm run generate:configs:tw && npm run generate:configs:jp && npm run generate:configs:us
scripts.generate:configs:fresh: npm run update:stockcodes && npm run generate:configs
scripts.//: === 配置生成 - 各市場 (Config Generation by Market) ===
=== 數據匯入 - 基礎面數據 (Fundamental Data Import) ===
scripts.import:fundamental:batch: tsx scripts/import-fundamental-api.ts --category quarterly && tsx scripts/import-ohlcv-api.ts --category daily
scripts.//: === 數據匯入 - 按市場 (Import by Market) ===
=== 數據匯入 - 按類型 (Import by Type) ===
=== 數據匯入 - OHLCV 歷史數據 (OHLCV Historical Data Import) ===
=== 數據匯入 - 標籤與符號 (Labels & Symbols Import) ===
=== 進度檢查與維護 (Progress Check & Maintenance) ===
scripts.progress:stats: du -sh .progress 2>/dev/null || echo 'No .progress directory' && ls -lh .progress 2>/dev/null | wc -l || echo '0 files'
scripts.maintenance: npm run progress:check && npm run clean:progress:old && npm run clean:outputs
scripts.maintenance:dry: npm run progress:check && echo '建議執行: npm run maintenance'
scripts.maintenance:full: npm run clean:progress:safe && npm run clean:outputs && npm run clean:configs:all
scripts.//: === 快速設置與重置 (Quick Setup & Reset) ===
scripts.setup:structured: npm run import:fundamental:batch && npm run import:symbols && npm run import:labels
scripts.setup:quarterly: npm run import:fundamental:quarterly && npm run import:symbols
scripts.setup:metadata: npm run import:fundamental:metadata && npm run import:symbols && npm run import:labels
scripts.setup:tw: npm run import:fundamental:tw && npm run import:symbols:tpe && npm run import:labels
scripts.setup:us: npm run import:fundamental:us && npm run import:symbols:us && npm run import:labels
scripts.setup:jp: npm run import:fundamental:jp && npm run import:symbols:jp && npm run import:labels
scripts.setup:symbols: npm run generate:mappings && npm run import:symbols && npm run import:labels
scripts.setup:legacy: npm run generate:mappings && npm run import:symbols && npm run import:labels:simple
scripts.reset:all: npm run clear:labels:hard && npm run setup:all
scripts.reset:soft: npm run clear:labels && npm run import:labels
scripts.reset:symbols: npm run clear:labels:hard && npm run setup:symbols
scripts.//: === 完整工作流程 (Complete Workflows) ===
scripts.flow:tw:full: npm run generate:configs:tw && npm run crawl:tw:quarterly
scripts.flow:tw:history: npm run generate:configs:tw:history && npm run crawl:tw:history
scripts.flow:us:full: npm run generate:configs:us && npm run crawl:us:quarterly
scripts.flow:us:history: npm run generate:configs:us:history && npm run crawl:us:history
scripts.flow:jp:full: npm run generate:configs:jp && npm run crawl:jp:quarterly
scripts.test-flow:tw:full: npm run generate:configs:tw && npm run crawl:test:tw
scripts.test-flow:us:full: npm run generate:configs:us && npm run crawl:test:us
scripts.test-flow:jp:full: npm run generate:configs:jp && npm run crawl:test:jp
scripts.test-flow:tw:eps: npm run generate:configs:tw:eps && npm run crawl:test:tw --type=eps
scripts.test-flow:single: npm run generate:configs:tw:eps -- --symbol=2330 && npx tsx src/cli.ts --config config-categorized/quarterly/tw/yahoo-finance-tw-eps-2330_TW.json
scripts.//: === 批次爬取命令 (Batch Crawling) ===
=== 批次爬取 - 狀態與監控 (Batch Status & Monitoring) ===
=== Site-based 並發控制 - 區域爬取 (Site-based Concurrency) ===
=== Site-based 並發控制 - 統計與監控 (Site-based Stats & Monitoring) ===
=== Site-based 並發控制 - 性能測試 (Site-based Performance Testing) ===
=== Site vs Global 性能對比 (Site vs Global Performance Comparison) ===
scripts.crawl:compare:tw: echo 'Site-based:' && npm run crawl:tw:quarterly -- --limit=10 && echo 'Global:' && npm run crawl:tw:quarterly:global -- --limit=10
scripts.crawl:compare:us: echo 'Site-based:' && npm run crawl:us:quarterly -- --limit=10 && echo 'Global:' && npm run crawl:us:quarterly:global -- --limit=10
scripts.crawl:compare:jp: echo 'Site-based:' && npm run crawl:jp:quarterly -- --limit=10 && echo 'Global:' && npm run crawl:jp:quarterly:global -- --limit=10
scripts.crawl:compare:all: npm run crawl:compare:tw && npm run crawl:compare:us && npm run crawl:compare:jp
scripts.crawl:test:site-vs-global: npm run crawl:tw:quarterly -- --limit=5 && npm run crawl:tw:quarterly:global -- --limit=5
scripts.//: === 重試機制 (Retry Mechanism) ===
scripts.crawl:retry:help: echo '🔄 重試失敗任務使用指南:' && echo '1. 查看可用進度檔案: npm run crawl:retry:list' && echo '2. 查看進度詳情: npm run crawl:progress:info -- <進度ID>' && echo '3. 重試失敗配置: npx tsx src/cli.ts crawl-batch --retry-failed=<進度ID>' && echo '4. 重試跳過配置: npx tsx src/cli.ts crawl-batch --retry-skipped-only=<進度ID>' && echo '5. 重試所有失敗和跳過: npx tsx src/cli.ts crawl-batch --retry-all=<進度ID>' && echo '6. 範例: npx tsx src/cli.ts crawl-batch --retry-all=batch-quarterly-us-all-20250817T062052 --reset-attempts'
scripts.crawl:retry:list: echo '📁 可用的進度檔案:' && ls -la .progress/ 2>/dev/null | grep batch || echo '沒有找到進度檔案'
scripts.crawl:retry:failed: echo '❌ 錯誤: --retry-failed 需要指定進度ID' && echo '💡 使用 npm run crawl:retry:help 查看使用方式'
scripts.//: === 重試機制 - 跳過任務支援 (Retry Mechanism - Skipped Tasks Support) ===
scripts.crawl:retry:skipped-only: echo '❌ 錯誤: --retry-skipped-only 需要指定進度ID' && echo '💡 使用方式: npx tsx src/cli.ts crawl-batch --retry-skipped-only=<進度ID>' && echo '💡 範例: npx tsx src/cli.ts crawl-batch --retry-skipped-only=batch-quarterly-us-all-20250817T062052'
scripts.crawl:retry:all-tasks: echo '❌ 錯誤: --retry-all 需要指定進度ID' && echo '💡 使用方式: npx tsx src/cli.ts crawl-batch --retry-all=<進度ID>' && echo '💡 範例: npx tsx src/cli.ts crawl-batch --retry-all=batch-quarterly-us-all-20250817T062052'
scripts.crawl:retry:force: echo '❌ 錯誤: --retry-all 需要指定進度ID' && echo '💡 強制重試使用方式: npx tsx src/cli.ts crawl-batch --retry-all=<進度ID> --force-retry --reset-attempts' && echo '💡 範例: npx tsx src/cli.ts crawl-batch --retry-all=batch-quarterly-us-all-20250817T062052 --reset-attempts'
scripts.crawl:retry:reset: echo '❌ 錯誤: 需要指定進度ID' && echo '💡 重置重試計數器使用方式: npx tsx src/cli.ts crawl-batch --retry-all=<進度ID> --reset-attempts' && echo '💡 這將清除所有任務的重試計數，讓所有失敗和跳過的任務都能重新開始'
scripts.//: === 進度狀態重置工具 (Progress Status Reset Tool) ===
scripts.crawl:reset:preview: echo '❌ 錯誤: 需要指定進度ID' && echo '💡 使用方式: tsx scripts/reset-progress-status.ts --progress-id=<ID> --dry-run' && echo '💡 範例: tsx scripts/reset-progress-status.ts --progress-id=batch-quarterly-us-all-20250817T062052 --type=skipped --dry-run'
scripts.crawl:reset:skipped: echo '❌ 錯誤: 需要指定進度ID' && echo '💡 使用方式: tsx scripts/reset-progress-status.ts --progress-id=<ID> --type=skipped --force' && echo '💡 範例: tsx scripts/reset-progress-status.ts --progress-id=batch-quarterly-us-all-20250817T062052 --type=skipped --force'
scripts.crawl:reset:failed: echo '❌ 錯誤: 需要指定進度ID' && echo '💡 使用方式: tsx scripts/reset-progress-status.ts --progress-id=<ID> --type=failed --force' && echo '💡 範例: tsx scripts/reset-progress-status.ts --progress-id=batch-quarterly-us-all-20250817T062052 --type=failed --force'
scripts.crawl:reset:all-failed-skipped: echo '❌ 錯誤: 需要指定進度ID' && echo '💡 使用方式: tsx scripts/reset-progress-status.ts --progress-id=<ID> --type=failed-and-skipped --force' && echo '💡 範例: tsx scripts/reset-progress-status.ts --progress-id=batch-quarterly-us-all-20250817T062052 --type=failed-and-skipped --reset-attempts --force'
scripts.crawl:retry:tw: echo '❌ 錯誤: --retry-failed 需要指定進度ID' && echo '💡 使用方式: npx tsx src/cli.ts crawl-batch --market=tw --retry-failed=<進度ID>'
scripts.crawl:retry:us: echo '❌ 錯誤: --retry-failed 需要指定進度ID' && echo '💡 使用方式: npx tsx src/cli.ts crawl-batch --market=us --retry-failed=<進度ID>'
scripts.crawl:retry:jp: echo '❌ 錯誤: --retry-failed 需要指定進度ID' && echo '💡 使用方式: npx tsx src/cli.ts crawl-batch --market=jp --retry-failed=<進度ID>'
scripts.crawl:retry:all: echo '❌ 錯誤: 批次重試需要指定各市場的進度ID' && echo '💡 請分別為各市場執行重試或使用 npm run crawl:retry:help'
scripts.crawl:retry:site: echo '❌ 錯誤: --retry-failed 需要指定進度ID' && echo '💡 使用方式: npx tsx src/cli.ts crawl-batch --retry-failed=<進度ID> --site-concurrency'
scripts.crawl:retry:global: echo '❌ 錯誤: --retry-failed 需要指定進度ID' && echo '💡 使用方式: npx tsx src/cli.ts crawl-batch --retry-failed=<進度ID> --global-concurrency'
scripts.//: === 跳過任務診斷與管理 (Skipped Tasks Diagnosis & Management) ===
=== 部門數據爬取 - 美國市場 (US Sector Scraping) ===
=== 部門數據爬取 - 台灣市場 (Taiwan Sector Scraping) ===
=== 部門更新工作流程 (Sector Update Workflows) ===
scripts.update:sectors:us: npm run scrape:us:all && npm run update:stockcodes:us
scripts.update:sectors:tw: npm run scrape:tw:categories && npm run scrape:tw:details && npm run update:stockcodes:tw
scripts.update:sectors:all: npm run update:sectors:us && npm run update:sectors:tw
scripts.//: === 配置管理與驗證 (Config Management & Validation) ===
scripts.configs:validate:tw: find config-categorized -path '**/tw/*.json' -exec npx tsx src/cli.ts validate {} \;
scripts.configs:validate:us: find config-categorized -path '**/us/*.json' -exec npx tsx src/cli.ts validate {} \;
scripts.configs:validate:jp: find config-categorized -path '**/jp/*.json' -exec npx tsx src/cli.ts validate {} \;
scripts.//: === Worker Scripts - 任務管理整合 (Worker Scripts - Task Management Integration) ===
=== Worker Scripts - 進階配置 (Worker Scripts - Advanced Config) ===
=== Worker Scripts - 版本管理 (Worker Scripts - Version Management) ===
=== Worker Scripts - 組件測試 (Worker Scripts - Component Testing) ===
=== 統計分析 (Statistics & Analysis) ===
scripts.stats:quick: echo "📊 快速統計：" && find output/quarterly -name '*.json' | wc -l | xargs echo "總 JSON 檔案:" && ls -la output/errors.log 2>/dev/null | awk '{print "錯誤日誌: " $5 " bytes"}' || echo "錯誤日誌: 不存在"
